workshoptitle: The Title of the Workshop is defined in the manifest

tutorials.title: Introduction to Data Science
tutorials.description: Introduction video on data science and machine learning concepts.

tutorials.title: Oracle Products overview
tutorials.description: High level overview of Oracle Cloud and products related to data science and machine learning.

tutorials.title: Prerequisite 1: Oracle Cloud tenancy
tutorials.description: An Oracle Cloud tenancy is required for all labs in this workshop.

tutorials.title: Prerequisite 2: Provision OCI Data Science
tutorials.description: This is only required if you want to do Labs 100 and/or 200.

tutorials.title: Prerequisite 3: Provision Oracle Analytics Cloud
tutorials.description: This is only required if you want to do Lab 300 'ML for Business Users (Oracle Analytics Cloud)'.

tutorials.title: Prerequisite 4: Provision Autonomous Transaction Processing
tutorials.description: This is only required if you want to do Lab 400 'In-database ML (Oracle Machine Learning)'.

tutorials.title: Lab 100: Linear Regression (OCI Data Science)
tutorials.description: Labs that follow the introduction are numbered, starting with Lab 1

tutorials.title: Lab 300: ML for Business Users (Oracle Analytics Cloud)
